channel.title: Modify Watches: Featured Products - Best-Sellers
channel.description: A list of the featured products at Modify Watches.

item.title: Gold & White 5-Piece Fall Colors Set
item.description:
This set includes the theree Fall colored straps and two matching limited-edition faces. It includes the white face, gold face, navy blue strap, crimson strap and pine lime strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $110.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the theree Fall colored straps and two matching limited-edition faces. It includes the white face, gold face, navy blue strap, crimson strap and pine lime strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $110.00
item.isc:description: This set includes the theree Fall colored straps and two matching limited-edition faces. It includes the white face, gold face, navy blue strap, crimson strap and pine lime strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

item.title: Holiday 2012 Core Faces
item.description:
This set includes the first five version 2.3 Modify face designs. It includes the black face, white face, silver face, gold face and new maroon face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

Price: $125.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes the first five version 2.3 Modify face designs. It includes the black face, white face, silver face, gold face and new maroon face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

item.title: The BIG One (12-Piece Set)
item.description:
This set includes twelve of the best-selling pieces. It includes the white face, black face, gold face, silver face, blue face, green face, black strap, white strap, medium gray, slate gray, blue strap and red strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other c..

Price: $240.00

This set includes twelve of the best-selling pieces. It includes the white face, black face, gold face, silver face, blue face, green face, black strap, white strap, medium gray, slate gray, blue strap and red strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other c..

item.title: Blue, Gold & Green Mod Set
item.description:
This set includes six of the best-selling pieces. It includes the gold face, blue face, green face,yellow strap, blue strap and seafoam green strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $120.00
item.content:encoded:
This set includes six of the best-selling pieces. It includes the gold face, blue face, green face,yellow strap, blue strap and seafoam green strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

item.title: 3-Piece Gold Face Set with Crimson & Navy
item.description:
This set includes three of the best-selling pieces. It includes the gold face, navy blue strap and crimson strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $65.00

item.title: 3-Piece Blue Face Set with Black & White
item.description:
This set includes three of the best-selling pieces. It includes the blue face, whte strap and black strap. Each of these pieces can be mix-and-matched with any of our other complementary pieces.

Price: $55.00

item.title: Black, White & Medium Gray Straps
item.description:
This set includes three of the best selling Modify straps It includes the black strap, white strap and medium gray strap. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch faces.

Price: $45.00

item.title: 3-Piece Black, White & Silver Face Set
item.description:
This set includes three of the best-selling Modify faces. It includes the black face, white face, and silver face. These can be mix-and-matched with any of our watch straps.

Price: $75.00
